Package com.qtplaf.library.swing.core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JPopupMenuConfigurator
    Interface to implement to additionally configure a popup menu.
    StatusBar
    Simple status bar interface to monitor fast tasks or processes.
    TableRecordListener
    Interface that shoud be implemented by listeners interested in table record events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    IconArrow
    An icon with an arrow inside.
    JCheckBoxField
    A check box field to use with boolean fields.
    JComboBoxField
    A combo box aimed to edit fields with possible values.
    JConsole
    A console mapped to a text area.
    JDialogColumns
    A dialog to selected columns (fields) either to set the visible columns in a JTableRecord or to set an order to sort it.
    JDialogSession
    Base dialog class that basically handles the working session.
    JFileChooser
    Extension of JFileChooser to add some features, like the compliance to file filters when hand writting a file name, etc.
    JFormRecord
    Root class for record dialogs.
    JFormRecordCustomizer
    Customizer of the JFormRecord.
    JFrameSession
    Base frame class that basically handles the working session.
    JLabelField
    A label related to an edit context.
    JLookupRecords
    A dialog to lookup and select several entities from a list.
    JMaskedField
    A JFormattedTextField that is comfortable working Field's and Value's.
    JMaskedFieldButton
    Combines a JMaskedField and a JButton on a JPanel to produce a component that's an entry field with an associated action button.
    JMaskedFieldDate
    Compound control to manage dates with a calendar panel.
    JOptionDialog
    An option dialog in the fashion of the JOptionPane, more friendly and under the total control of this library.
    JOptionFrame
    An option frame in the fashion of the JOptionPane, more friendly and under the total control of this library.
    JPanelButtons
    A panel to contain an arbitrary number of buttons defined by actions, wrapping them as necessary depending on the number and the panel size.
    JPanelCalendar
    A date selection panel.
    JPanelColumns
    A panel designed to select/unselect the columns.
    JPanelFormFields
    A panel that holds a grid form of fields from a record.
    JPanelProgress
    A panel aimed to monitor the progress of a time consuming task normally executed in thread separated from the event dispatch thread.
    JPanelProgressGroup
    A container for progress panels.
    JPanelStatus
    A status panel that shows a status line and optionally, at its right, a progress bar.
    JPanelTableRecord
    A panel that holds a JTableRecord.
    JPanelTreeMenu
    A panel to manage tree menu items.
    JPassword
    A password field implementation.
    JTableRecord
    Extends JTable to support lists of records.
    JTableRecordCellEditor
    A cell editor for the JTableRecord component, aimed to work with EditField edit components.
    JTableRecordCellRenderer
    Normal TableCellRenderer for a JTableRecord.
    JTableRecordStatusPanel
    A status panel for the record table.
    LineBorderSides
    A line border deciding the sides.
    SwingUtils
    Swing utilities.
    SwingUtils.AcceleratorKeyListener
    A key listener to manage accelerator keys.
    TableModelRecord
    A table model aimed to work with sets of records.
    TableRecordEvent
    Events generated by JtableRecord and TableModelRecord to notify selection, insert, delete and update events, in order perhaps to synchronize them with a persistor.
    TreeMenuItem
    An item of tree menu system.
    TreeMenuItemCellRenderer
    Default tree cell renderer for the tree menu.
    TreeMenuNode
    Extends the DefaultMutableTreeNode to give additional support for menu actions.
    WrapLayout
    A flow layout that wraps components when they do not fit in the row.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IconArrow.Direction
    Arrow directions.
    JPanelColumns.Mode
    Enumerates the possible operations or modes.
